title: Rahul vs Rijiju: Are Soldiers Killed on Duty Given Martyr Status?
subtitle: Fact Check: Congress President Rahul Gandhi, while interacting with students at the Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium in New Delhi, said that paramilitary personnel killed in the line of duty will be accorded ‘martyr’ or shaheed status.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
On 23 February, Congress President Rahul Gandhi said that if the party comes to power, it will accord paramilitary personnel killed in the line of duty 'martyr' or 'shaheed' status.

Responding to a question on martyr status to jawans during an interaction with students at the Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium in New Delhi, Gandhi said: "I agree with you. Paramilitary jawans don't get 'martyr' status. They should get it, and if we come to power, they will be accorded that status."
